img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(39\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/b/bc/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2839%29.png)
Turn and face the opposite direction and deal with the archer on the stairs to the right first. Climb up the stairs to reach a wooden structure, where you can find the first Meditation Spot of the Chapter.
img_below_text:
The Relief, Camp of Seasons Meditation Spot

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing a character climbing a wooden structure in a rocky, forested area. This location is significant as it features the first Meditation Spot of the chapter, providing a place for the player to rest and progress in the game. The setting is atmospheric, with a misty, dark environment and a distant archer, suggesting a need for strategic navigation and combat.
